name: Naufragii (StudioMambo)
description:
A game about mental health and overcoming these difficulties which are portrayed through both the difficulty and the sound of the game. We represented schizophrenia through our sound to give a hallucinogenic sound effect. 

Sometimes dealing with mental health feels like you are climbing a mountain which we show in our rocky game texture. The struggle also can feel like you are going back and forth which is why we developed the game to have this feeling with the mechanic of falling back to an earlier point in the level if you fail a jump.

To play the game download the zip file then extract it on to your computer.

Then run the application called RaiseTheGameJam

Controls

Click the left mouse button to jump

The distance between the mouse and the ball determines the length of the jump (this is shown with a gauge)

Aim

Try and get to the end of the level, if you fall you  will have to make your way back up to where you started. Try not to let the background sound distract you!
